document.discussion_title: Scientists have developed edible clingfilm made from milk
document.topic_text: Scientists have developed edible clingfilm made from milk Soon, you won’t even have to bother unwrapping your packed lunch. You’ll just be able to eat your sandwiches, clingfilm and all. Yum. Because scientists have developed an edible clingfilm, made from milk protein, and it could be available within three years. The new cling film has been developed to keep food fresher and is said to be 500 times better than plastics at keeping oxygen away from food.
